Player History
Earned first career win on 4/24/1985...
Had first career hit on 5/4/1985, off John Candelaria (PIT)...
2/2/1986: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,965,714 through salary arbitration...
6/17/1986: Signed a contract extension with Los Angeles, $5,000,000 per year, for 5 years.
Injured on 7/28/1987 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from Los Angeles to San Diego on 2/2/1988 (Going to SD: P Alejandro Pena, 1B Jeff Conine. Going to LAD: P Mike Walters)...
Traded from San Diego to New York (M) on 5/2/1988 (Going to SD: P Terry Leach. Going to NYM: P Alejandro Pena)...
Injured on 5/22/1988 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 3/15/1989 with a Torn Back Muscle, out for full season...
Traded from New York (M) to San Diego on 2/6/1990 (Going to SD: P Bryan Harvey, P Alejandro Pena, P Roger Salkeld. Going to NYM: P Bob Milacki, 1B Jeff Conine, LF Ray Lankford)...
Injured on 3/12/1990 with a Sore Shoulder, out for one week...
Traded from San Diego to Montreal on 4/18/1990 (Going to SD: LF Pedro Guerrero. Going to MON: P Don Peters, P Jeremy Hernandez, P Toby Borland, P Alejandro Pena)...
